def_cn: (佛教和印度教中的)曼特罗，祷文，符咒
def_en: A mantra is a word or phrase repeated by Buddhists and Hindus when they meditate, or to help them feel calm.

def_cn: （尤指认为并不正确或只是部分正确的）准则，原则，圭臬
def_en: You can use mantra to refer to a statement or a principle that people repeat very often because they think it is true, especially when you think that it not true or is only part of the truth.
